full_summary:
================

**Tender Invitation for Firearm Racking System**

### Technical Details

* **Procurement ID:** EQ754-212131
* **Publication Date:** May 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 12, 2023, 14:00:00

### Contract Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit bids for the procurement of a Firearm Racking System under the Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation number WS3987390260. The proposed system will be used for freestanding storage, as classified under the UNSPSC code 56111803.

### Key Requirements

* The Firearm Racking System must be designed and constructed to meet the security and storage needs of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC).
* The system must be capable of storing firearms and related equipment safely and securely.
* The bid submission must include a detailed proposal outlining the scope of work, timeline, and pricing.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Deliverables and Location

The successful bidder will deliver the Firearm Racking System to the Correctional Service of Canada, with installation taking place in Ontario (except National Capital Region). The system must meet all relevant security standards and regulations.

### Contact Information

For any queries or clarifications, please contact Andrew Denbeigh, PSPC, at andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

### Important Deadlines

* Tender closing date: May 12, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: May 12, 2023
* Expected contract end date: Not specified
